Melodia : Analyse MelodiesÂ¶

The module melodia focuses on the analysis of the melody (tonic, scale, tessiture, etc.) and on melodic clustering.

Trying to analyse a melody leads us to the question : How to define a melody ? Components of this module will try ti answer that question.

It’s main features are :

  • Comparing PDFs of melodies scale using a correlation coefficient;
  • Getting a similarity matrix between melodies.
